channel.title: Changkhui: Study Abroad
channel.itunes:subtitle: Sharing overseas studying experience
channel.itunes:author: Passakorn Hongsyok
channel.itunes:summary: Visiting the old memory lane! We shared experience when we went overseas to study. Anywhere, really. Instead of letting that memory faded, some might want to share it to others, and, some may want to visit the same place.
channel.description: Visiting the old memory lane! We shared experience when we went overseas to study. Anywhere, really. Instead of letting that memory faded, some might want to share it to others, and, some may want to visit the same place.
